result.eng: Shall I buy a bottle of wine?
result.html: an gceannóidh mé buidéal fíonaShall I buy a bottle of wine?
result.ponchtml: an gceannóiḋ mé buidéal fíonaShall I buy a bottle of wine?

result.eng: Whall I guy a bottle of milk?
result.html: an gceannóidh mé buidéal bainneWhall I guy a bottle of milk?
result.ponchtml: an gceannóiḋ mé buidéal bainneWhall I guy a bottle of milk?

result.eng: I will drink a bottle of beer, please.
result.ga: Ólfaidh mé buidéal beorach le do thoil
result.orig: Ólfaidh mé buidéal beorach le do thoil
result.html: Ólfaidh mé buidéal beorach le do thoilI will drink a bottle of beer, please.
result.ponchtml: Ólfaiḋ mé buidéal beoraċ le do ṫoilI will drink a bottle of beer, please.

result.eng: We need a bottle of milk also, Micí.
result.ga: tá buidéal bainne uainn freisin a mhicí
result.orig: tá buidéal bainne uainn freisin a mhicí
result.html: tá buidéal bainne uainn freisin a mhicíWe need a bottle of milk also, Micí.
result.ponchtml: tá buidéal bainne uainn freisin a ṁicíWe need a bottle of milk also, Micí.

result.eng: Open the door, Thomas, and take out a bottle.
result.ga: oscail an doras a thomáis agus tóg amach an buidéal
result.orig: oscail an doras a thomáis agus tóg amach an buidéal
result.html: oscail an doras a thomáis agus tóg amach an buidéalOpen the door, Thomas, and take out a bottle.
result.ponchtml: oscail an doras a ṫomáis agus tóg amaċ an buidéalOpen the door, Thomas, and take out a bottle.

result.eng: A bottle of whiskey was put in front of him.
result.html: leagadh buidéal uisce beatha roimheA bottle of whiskey was put in front of him.
result.ponchtml: leagaḋ buidéal uisce beaṫa roiṁeA bottle of whiskey was put in front of him.

result.eng: I guess it is their lot, as schoolmasters, to be fond of the bottle.
result.ga: is cosúil go bhfuil sé de bhuaidh orthu a bheith tugtha don ghloine mar mháistrí scoile
result.orig: is cosúil go bhfuil sé de bhuaidh orthu a bheith tugtha don ghloine mar mháistrí scoile
result.html: is cosúil go bhfuil sé de bhuaidh orthu a bheith tugtha don ghloine mar mháistrí scoileI guess it is their lot, as schoolmasters, to be fond of the bottle.
result.ponchtml: is cosúil go ḃfuil sé de ḃuaiḋ orṫu a ḃeiṫ tugṫa don ġloine mar ṁáistrí scoileI guess it is their lot, as schoolmasters, to be fond of the bottle.

result.eng: Each man drank his fill from the bottle.
result.ga: d'ól 'ach aon fhear acu tarraingt a chinn den bhuidéal
result.orig: d'ól 'ach aon fhear acu tarraingt a chinn den bhuidéal
result.html: d'ól 'ach aon fhear acu tarraingt a chinn den bhuidéalEach man drank his fill from the bottle.
result.ponchtml: d'ól 'aċ aon ḟear acu tarraingt a ċinn den ḃuidéalEach man drank his fill from the bottle.
